module.p:
ruig ... gu sàbhailte ... reaches ... safely –
’S e an Dùdlachd a bha ann agus bha e fhathast dorcha nuair a dh’fhàg a’ chlann an taigh, ach ràinig iad an sgoil gu sàbhailte aig cóig mionaidean gu naoi.
It was December and it was still dark when the children left the house, but they reached the school safely at five minutes to nine. td. 183
